entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Temiscouata
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:06 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow late this evening. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
